OUTLINE : This multicenter study . - Neoadjuvant therapy : Patients receive gemcitabine IV 30 minute day 1 8 ; oral capecitabine twice daily day 1-14 ; bevacizumab* IV 30-90 minute day 1 . Treatment repeat every 3 week 3 course absence disease progression unacceptable toxicity . Patients undergo blood sample collection baseline periodically study biomarker correlative study .
